#summary Syntax of Identifiers
#labels Phase-Design

= Identifiers =

== Variables == 

Variable names begin with '$' followed by a letter.  They may contain letters, numbers, and underscores.  Variable names are case-sensitive.

== Constants ==

Constant names begin with '%' followed by a letter.  They may contain letters, numbers, and underscores.  Constant names are case-sensitive.

== Functions ==

Function names, both user-defined and built-in, must begin with a letter and may contain letters, numbers, and underscores.  Function names are case-sensitive.

== Units ==

Unit names must begin with a letter and contain letters, numbers, and underscores.  Unit names are case-*insensitive*.
